name: chromeos-filesystem-nextcloud
description: Nextcloud file system provider for Chrome OS

scripts.package: zip -r ext.zip manifest.json _locales scripts icons style.css window.html node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.js* node_modules/uuid/dist/umd/uuidv1.min.js node_modules/webdav/web/index.js
